bike.description: OCLV Mountain Carbon main frame & seatstay w/alloy chainstay, Carbon Armor, ABP Convert, Full Floater, E2 tapered head tube, front derailleur internal cable routing, Stealth routing ready, magnesium EVO Link, Mino Link, replaceable derailleur hanger, 150mm travel

components.description: Bontrager Rhythm Elite TLR Disc wheel system, 15mm front hub, 142x12mm rear hub, 28 hole, Tubeless Ready
Bontrager Race X Lite Carbon Low Riser, 31.8mm, 15mm rise, 9 degree sweep
Shimano Deore XT M785 hydraulic disc brakes
Trek fork & shock sag meter, Bontrager shock pump
